meta.title: Faith Family Academy Charter Schools in Dallas Fort Worth

meta.name: description
meta.content: Find out why Faith Family Academy is one of the best charter schools in Dallas-Fort Worth!
Find out why Faith Family Academy is one of the best charter schools in Dallas-Fort Worth!
Faith Family Academy Charter Schools in Dallas Fort Worth

li.a: Oak Cliff Lower School-Early Childhood Center

div.div: Faith Family Academy - where public school meets private education.

div.h5: The official start of distance learning activities is Monday, March 30th. For instructions on how to access online learning tools and additional resources for students and parents, please go to our Distance Learning page.

div.h3: Stay up-to-date on all Faith Family Academy news by signing up for our email alerts and newsletter:

hr.p: Thank you to our valued Community Partners for providing support to Faith Family Academy, our students and their families.

table.style: border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 10px; border-width: 0px; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-style: solid; margin: 0px auto;

a.style: background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); color: rgb(9, 77, 72); outline: 0px; font-size: 1em;

p.strong: High-Quality Charter Schools in Dallas-Fort Worth

div.p: Faith Family Academy is a public, open enrollment charter school district, serving grades Pre-K through 12, in the Dallas-Fort Worth area.

div.class: fsElement fsNews fsList main-news fsItemCount_3 fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailLarge

div.a: Faith Family Academy Community - Important Notice for Spring Break // Comunidad de Faith Family Academy – Noticia Importante para las vacaciones de Primavera

li.span: Increase in Yearly Scholarship Money Earned

p.strong: We are now accepting applications for the 2020-2021 school year:

div.p: Faith Family Academy does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, religion, disability, age, or any other basis prohibited by law in its programs, activities, or employment practices. For inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies, contact Ryan Harris, Director of Human Resources, (972) 224-4110 or rharris@faithfamilyacademy.org.

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

div.p: Faith Family Academy remains committed to doing our part to keep our community safe, provide critical services, and support the education of our students.
To keep up-to-date on all school communications, please sign up for our email alerts and newsletter at http://eepurl.com/gWffEb.
